\f0\fs26 \cf0 Release information:\ pkg: CACKey\ author: US Army Corps of Engineers\ contact: Roy Keene <roy.s.keene@usace.army.mil>\ US Army Corps of Engineers\ Information Technology Laboratory\ Vicksburg, MS 39180\ ------------------------------------------------\ \ The following files in the source directory are the intellectual property of the\ Free Software Foundation and are licensed under the terms of the GNU General\ Public License (GPL):\ config.guess, config.sub, install-sh\ \ The files in the source directory and the "leakcheck" directory are the intellectual\ property of the United States Government. It is not clear which, if any,\ license is made on them. In addition, as of 07-JUN-2010 they have not be\ cleared for public release.\ \ The files in the "pkcs11/" directory are licensed under the terms of the\ following licenses:\ mypkcs11.h : GNU General Public License 2.1.\ pkcs11.h : GNU General Public License 2.1.\ pkcs11f.h : GNU General Public License 2.1.\ pkcs11n.h : Mozilla Public License or GNU General Public License\ pkcs11t.h : GNU General Public License 2.1.}

requirement.message: This CACKey release requires Mac OS X 10.5.
This CACKey release requires Mac OS X 10.4.
